s: Wish I got a different one, hope ... brand ... Ok, let me start here .. I'm 6'2" and 220 lbs. Before buying this chair, I bought the Secretlab Titan gaming chair. I paid like $430 for it and it turned out to be the most uncomfortable chair I had ever sat in. The seat was so firm/hard I felt like I was sitting on cement. After selling that POS and taking a $100 loss (because their return policy sucks), I found the Arozzi Verona Pro ...
